segments.text: Good game ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . But too hot for me today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know . Kind of hard to concentrate , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely . Who were you playing with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , just on my own . I just joined , so I don't really have any partners .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Oh , well , in that case we should play together some time . What's your handicap ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 16 . Yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No kidding ! I'm 16 , too . We should definitely play together some time . My name's Bob .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Jane . Nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . So , do you like the course ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's fine . However , I personally think the fairways between the greens are a bit too long , especially for such a hot climate . Don't they have carts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , they used to , but they got rid of them because of environmental concerns .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's good . I guess the caddies were pleased .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , in my opinion , the carts were better because you don't have to tip them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but look at it this way , getting rid of the carts probably gives more work to local people , which is a good thing , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Possibly , but I still miss them ! What bothers me is that the heat makes the caddies ' life quite hard . One member's caddy fainted last week !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How awful , poor guy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Luckily it was on the eighteen hole , quite near the clubhouse , so he didn't have far to carry him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my God , you're kidding me ! He carried him back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yup .
segments.speaker: S2
